mms_1b_hyp: तुम्हारे पास तीन महीने बच्चे हैं

llm_decision.raw:
LANGUAGE: Hindi  
TRANSCRIPTION: तुम गलत मंजिल पर हो  
CONFIDENCE: high  
REASONING: The hypotheses from MMS-ZeroShot-Constrained and OmniASR both correctly transcribe the phrase as "तुम गलत मंजिल पर हो", which is semantically and phonetically accurate. "मंजिल" (floor/level) is the correct word in context, as opposed to "मनजील" (a misspelling) or "बच्चे" (children), which are clearly errors. Whisper and MMS-1B contain significant errors (e.g., "मनजील", "तीन महीने बच्चे"). The consensus between two strong models (MMS-ZeroShot-Constrained and OmniASR) supports the selection of "तुम गलत मंजिल पर हो" as the most accurate transcription.
